metadata.name: Python Spawning Pretty TTY Via PTY Module
metadata.comment: Detects a python process calling to the PTY module in order to spawn a pretty tty which could be indicative of potential reverse shell activity.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/python')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/python2')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/python3'))) AND (contains(lower(process.name), lower('/python2.')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower('/python3.'))) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('import pty')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('from pty '))) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('spawn')))

output.summary: Detects a python process calling to the PTY module in order to spawn a pretty tty which could be indicative of potential reverse shell activity.
